nodes.text: Wolga was a member of the Hutt species who was suspected of being a gangster sometime between the years 19 and 1 BBY. Just prior to the trial of Wolga, the witness, Brio Tabbett, was removed by bounty hunter Boba Fett.

Wolga the Hutt was first mentioned in the "Boba Fett" entry in the in-game databank of the PlayStation 3/Xbox 360 versions of Star Wars: The Force Unleashed II, a LucasArts video game released in 2010.
